categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: A battle took place in the Wroona system during the Imperial Period. Starships of the Imperial Office of Customs fought a pirate fleet in the outer edges of the system. Civilian vessels were advised by the Wroonan METOSP to avoid the area as Imperial forces were allowed to engage any non Imperial starships. Smuggler Platt Okeefe was traveling in the Wroona system by the time of this conflict.
